ol_salty.name: Ol' Salty
ol_salty.title: Space Pirate Captain
ol_salty.philosophy: Survive, adapt, prosper. The galaxy rewards the clever.
ol_salty.voiceStyle: Boisterous, irreverent, teasing. Speaks in tales, colloquialisms, and pirate flavor.
ol_salty.values: Wit, self-preservation, boldness, freedom and profit
ol_salty.tooltip: Ol' Salty reflects your character through a scoundrel's irreverent lens

levelGreetings.1: Arr! Ye survived yer first scrap with the law! Welcome aboard me ship, ye scurvy spacer!
levelGreetings.2: Har har! Look at ye, already gettin' the hang of this. Ye might even live through the next spice run!
levelGreetings.3: Shiver me hyperdrives! Not a scratch on ye yet. Impressive for a greenhorn, ye rascal!
levelGreetings.4: Blimey! Ye're navigatin' the stars like a proper space-dog now. Don't get cocky, though.
levelGreetings.5: Arr! Ye're makin' a name fer yerself, plunderin' and swindlin' like a true scoundrel!
levelGreetings.6: By the Twin Suns o' Tatooine! Ye're makin' mischief in half the sector already. Keep yer wits sharp, matey!
levelGreetings.7: Har! Ye've likely swindled half a dozen systems by now. I'm almost proud… almost!
levelGreetings.8: Pieces o' eight, err… credits! Ye be worth yer weight in loot now, savvy?
levelGreetings.9: Arrr! The Imps are whisperin' yer name already. Keep blastin' and lootin' before they catch ye!
levelGreetings.10: Blow me to the Outer Rim! Ye've earned the right to call yerself a proper space pirate. Don't let it go to yer head.
levelGreetings.11: The galaxy's watchin' now, mate. Keep this up and every cantina will be singin' shanties about ye.
levelGreetings.12: Ye're navigatin' chaos like the Millennium Falcon through an asteroid field. Smooth sailin', kid.
levelGreetings.13: Thirteen! Lucky for us, unlucky for anyone crossin' yer path. Har har!
levelGreetings.14: Could retire rich on some backwater moon, but where's the fun in that? Ye got the stars to terrorize!
levelGreetings.15: Everyone from here to Nal Hutta knows yer name. Keep makin' trouble, ye rapscallion!
levelGreetings.16: Sweet Spice o' Kessel! Ye're a terror on the spaceways, and I'm not even exaggeratin'!
levelGreetings.17: Seventeen systems can't hold ye. Slipperier than a greased Hutt, har har!
levelGreetings.18: At this rate, ye'll have yer own fleet before breakfast. Keep it up, captain!
levelGreetings.19: Chaos follows ye like a loyal pet. One more push and ye'll be legend.
levelGreetings.20: Arr! Ye've done it! The greatest scoundrel in the galaxy, hands down. Now, let's find some Corellian ale to celebrate!

pistoleer.greeting: Pistoleer, fast hands and sharper instincts. You shoot first and disappear before they know you were there.
pistoleer.confirmation: Stay light on your feet, keep your blasters ready, and make every shot count. Precision and timing are your lifelines.

skill_monkey.greeting: Skill Monkey, clever and unpredictable. You turn every tool into an advantage.
skill_monkey.confirmation: Leverage every skill, device, and trick at your disposal. Creativity and improvisation keep you alive and one step ahead.

outlaw.greeting: Outlaw, untamed and reckless. You thrive outside the law and in the chaos.
outlaw.confirmation: Trust instincts, exploit opportunities, and keep moving. Freedom is your weapon and audacity is your shield.

knuckledragger.greeting: Knuckledragger. Up close and personal. You fight dirty, smart, and fast.
knuckledragger.confirmation: Close the distance, strike decisively, and control the fight. Brute force combined with awareness keeps you alive.

brigand.greeting: Brigand, sly and opportunistic. You take what you want and vanish before they notice.
brigand.confirmation: Bluff, intimidate, and act boldly. Timing, cunning, and audacity define your success.

scoundrel_pistoleer.greeting: Arr! A Pistoleer, ye say? Quick draw, quick thinking, and always one step ahead of the law! That's the scoundrel's way, savvy?
scoundrel_pistoleer.confirmation: They never see it coming—that's the whole point, me hearty! Keep yer blasters charged and yer reflexes sharper!

scoundrel_skill_monkey.greeting: Har har! A Skill Monkey! Versatile as a Corellian smuggler, ye are!
scoundrel_skill_monkey.confirmation: Learn every skill in the book, ye clever rogue! A pirate who can do everything is worth their weight in aurodium!

scoundrel_outlaw.greeting: An Outlaw! Livin' free, makin' yer own luck, and thumbin' yer nose at authority!
scoundrel_outlaw.confirmation: Luck? Ye make yer own luck, friend! Stay sharp and stay free, ye magnificent scallywag!

scoundrel_knuckledragger.greeting: Arr! A brawler who ain't afraid to fight dirty! I like yer spirit, matey!
scoundrel_knuckledragger.confirmation: No rules in a street fight! Use every trick, every advantage, and never fight fair!

scoundrel_gambler.greeting: A gambler! Someone who understands that risk and reward dance together.
scoundrel_gambler.confirmation: Play the odds, read the marks, and know when to go all in. That's how ye get rich!

scoundrel_smuggler.greeting: A smuggler! Moving goods, working the black markets, staying one step ahead of the authorities.
scoundrel_smuggler.confirmation: Master the trade routes, know your contacts, and always have a buyer waiting.

scoundrel_trickster.greeting: A trickster! All about deception, misdirection, and turning the enemy's strengths into weaknesses.
scoundrel_trickster.confirmation: Layer your deceptions, stay unpredictable, and always have an escape route!

guidance.class: Arr! Pick yer path wisely, matey! The right tricks make the difference between a chest o' credits and a long swim in the void.
guidance.background: Everyone's got a past, matey. Question is — does yours give you leverage, or does it give someone else a knife to your back?
guidance.talents: Every talent's a tool in yer scoundrel's kit. Pick what helps ye swindle, sneak, and survive.
guidance.abilities: Gotta be strong, quick, and clever to stay alive. Balance, savvy?
guidance.skills: Skills are what separate the professionals from the dead ones.
guidance.languages: Words are currency. Every language is a lockpick.
guidance.multiclass: A pirate wears many hats… and steals most of 'em too.
guidance.forcePowers: Force powers? Pick somethin' flashy—it makes the getaway easier.
guidance.hp: Tougher than durasteel, ye are. Can't spend yer loot if ye're dead!
guidance.summary: Credits come and go. Reputation sticks. Try not to die before the second act.

tier1: I was raised on deck plating and bulkheads. Planets were just ports you sailed away from.
tier2: Every spacer learns what desperation smells like.
tier3: I once sold somethin’ priceless to keep my ship afloat.
tier4: The galaxy’s like the tide—it always brings wreckage back around.
tier5: The kid I sold wound up flyin’ my ship years later. Jedi.

dspBlocked: Not every logbook’s open for readin’.
You haven’t earned that chart yet.
